00062 /*
00063  * clnt_raw.c
00064  *
00065  * Copyright (C) 1984, Sun Microsystems, Inc.
00066  *
00067  * Memory based rpc for simple testing and timing.
00068  * Interface to create an rpc client and server in the same process.
00069  * This lets us simulate rpc and get round trip overhead, without
00070  * any interference from the kernel.
00071  */
00072 
00073 #include "Rpc.h"
00074 
00075 #define MCALL_MSG_SIZE 24
00076 
00077 /*
00078  * This is the "network" we will be moving stuff over.
00079  */
00080 static struct Clntraw_private {
00081         CLIENT  client_object;
00082         XDR     Xdr_stream;
00083         char    _raw_buf[UDPMSGSIZE];
00084         char    mashl_callmsg[MCALL_MSG_SIZE];
00085         u_int   mcnt;
00086 } *Clntraw_private;
00087 
00088 static enum Clnt_stat   Clntraw_call();
00089 static void             Clntraw_abort();
00090 static void             Clntraw_geterr();
00091 static bool_t           Clntraw_freeres();
00092 static bool_t           Clntraw_control();
00093 static void             Clntraw_destroy();
00094 
00095 static struct Clnt_ops client_ops = {
00096         Clntraw_call,
00097         Clntraw_abort,
00098         Clntraw_geterr,
00099         Clntraw_freeres,
00100         Clntraw_destroy,
00101         Clntraw_control
00102 };
00103 
00104 void    svc_getreq();
00105 
00106 /*
00107  * Create a client handle for memory based rpc.
00108  */
00109 CLIENT *
00110 Clntraw_create(prog, vers)
00111         u_long prog;
00112         u_long vers;
00113 {
00114         register struct Clntraw_private *clp = Clntraw_private;
00115         struct Rpc_msg call_msg;
00116         XDR *Xdrs = &clp->Xdr_stream;
00117         CLIENT  *client = &clp->client_object;
00118 
00119         if (clp == 0) {
00120                 clp = (struct Clntraw_private *)mem_calloc(1, sizeof (*clp));
00121                 if (clp == 0)
00122                         return (0);
00123                 Clntraw_private = clp;
00124         }
00125         /*
00126          * pre-serialize the static part of the call msg and stash it away
00127          */
00128         call_msg.rm_direction = CALL;
00129         call_msg.rm_call.cb_rpcvers = RPC_MSG_VERSION;
00130         call_msg.rm_call.cb_prog = prog;
00131         call_msg.rm_call.cb_vers = vers;
00132         Xdrmem_create(Xdrs, clp->mashl_callmsg, MCALL_MSG_SIZE, XDR_ENCODE);
00133         if (! Xdr_callhdr(Xdrs, &call_msg)) {
00134                 perror("Clnt_raw.c - Fatal header serialization error.");
00135         }
00136         clp->mcnt = XDR_GETPOS(Xdrs);
00137         XDR_DESTROY(Xdrs);
00138 
00139         /*
00140          * Set xdrmem for client/server shared buffer
00141          */
00142         Xdrmem_create(Xdrs, clp->_raw_buf, UDPMSGSIZE, XDR_FREE);
00143 
00144         /*
00145          * create client handle
00146          */
00147         client->cl_ops = &client_ops;
00148         client->cl_auth = authnone_create();
00149         return (client);
00150 }
00151 
00152 static enum Clnt_stat
00153 Clntraw_call(h, proc, xargs, argsp, xresults, resultsp, timeout)
00154         CLIENT *h;
00155         u_long proc;
00156         Xdrproc_t xargs;
00157         caddr_t argsp;
00158         Xdrproc_t xresults;
00159         caddr_t resultsp;
00160         struct timeval timeout;
00161 {
00162         register struct Clntraw_private *clp = Clntraw_private;
00163         register XDR *Xdrs = &clp->Xdr_stream;
00164         struct Rpc_msg msg;
00165         enum Clnt_stat status;
00166         struct Rpc_err error;
00167 
00168         if (clp == 0)
00169                 return (RPC_FAILED);
00170 call_again:
00171         /*
00172          * send request
00173          */
00174         Xdrs->x_op = XDR_ENCODE;
00175         XDR_SETPOS(Xdrs, 0);
00176         ((struct Rpc_msg *)clp->mashl_callmsg)->rm_xid ++ ;
00177         if ((! XDR_PUTBYTES(Xdrs, clp->mashl_callmsg, clp->mcnt)) ||
00178             (! XDR_PUTLONG(Xdrs, (long *)&proc)) ||
00179             (! AUTH_MARSHALL(h->cl_auth, Xdrs)) ||
00180             (! (*xargs)(Xdrs, argsp))) {
00181                 return (RPC_CANTENCODEARGS);
00182         }
00183         (void)XDR_GETPOS(Xdrs);  /* called just to cause overhead */
00184 
00185         /*
00186          * We have to call server input routine here because this is
00187          * all going on in one process. Yuk.
00188          */
00189         svc_getreq(1);
00190 
00191         /*
00192          * get results
00193          */
00194         Xdrs->x_op = XDR_DECODE;
00195         XDR_SETPOS(Xdrs, 0);
00196         msg.acpted_rply.ar_verf = _null_auth;
00197         msg.acpted_rply.ar_results.where = resultsp;
00198         msg.acpted_rply.ar_results.proc = xresults;
00199         if (! Xdr_replymsg(Xdrs, &msg))
00200                 return (RPC_CANTDECODERES);
00201         _seterr_reply(&msg, &error);
00202         status = error.re_status;
00203 
00204         if (status == RPC_SUCCESS) {
00205                 if (! AUTH_VALIDATE(h->cl_auth, &msg.acpted_rply.ar_verf)) {
00206                         status = RPC_AUTHERROR;
00207                 }
00208         }  /* end successful completion */
00209         else {
00210                 if (AUTH_REFRESH(h->cl_auth))
00211                         goto call_again;
00212         }  /* end of unsuccessful completion */
00213 
00214         if (status == RPC_SUCCESS) {
00215                 if (! AUTH_VALIDATE(h->cl_auth, &msg.acpted_rply.ar_verf)) {
00216                         status = RPC_AUTHERROR;
00217                 }
00218                 if (msg.acpted_rply.ar_verf.oa_base != NULL) {
00219                         Xdrs->x_op = XDR_FREE;
00220                         (void)Xdr_opaque_auth(Xdrs, &(msg.acpted_rply.ar_verf));
00221                 }
00222         }
00223 
00224         return (status);
00225 }
00226 
00227 static void
00228 Clntraw_geterr()
00229 {
00230 }
00231 
00232 
00233 static bool_t
00234 Clntraw_freeres(cl, xdr_res, res_ptr)
00235         CLIENT *cl;
00236         Xdrproc_t xdr_res;
00237         caddr_t res_ptr;
00238 {
00239         register struct Clntraw_private *clp = Clntraw_private;
00240         register XDR *Xdrs = &clp->Xdr_stream;
00241         bool_t rval;
00242 
00243         if (clp == 0)
00244         {
00245                 rval = (bool_t) RPC_FAILED;
00246                 return (rval);
00247         }
00248         Xdrs->x_op = XDR_FREE;
00249         return ((*xdr_res)(Xdrs, res_ptr));
00250 }

00252 static void
00253 Clntraw_abort()
00254 {
00255 }
00256 
00257 static bool_t
00258 Clntraw_control()
00259 {
00260         return (FALSE);
00261 }
00262 
00263 static void
00264 Clntraw_destroy()
00265 {
00266 }
